snippet: The federal government has agreed to buy the closed Thomson Correctional Center in western Illinois for $165 million, state leaders announced on Tuesday.
abstract: Federal government agrees to buy the closed Thomson Correctional Center in western Illinois for $165 million.
lead_paragraph: The federal government has agreed to buy the closed Thomson Correctional Center in western Illinois for $165 million, state leaders announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: Illinois: Federal Government Agrees to Buy Prison
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Federal Government Agrees To Buy Prison
